QuestData.Title: Mastering Puppets
QuestData.Description: <During your brief communion with the Eye, you felt that its power source lay deep within the hovel. You felt the weight of a powerful tome, binding together four elements.>$B$B<Mastering the Eye will require you to search the hovel for this tome.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the Twilight Apocrypha inside of Gar'gol's Hovel in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Locate the Twilight Apocrypha inside of Gar'gol's Hovel in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: <A heavy tome, bound in flesh, lies open on the table.>$B$B<The language - pictographic and scrawled in rust-colored ink - is undecipherable, but notes and translations are tucked within several pages. This must be what you're looking for.>
